definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
to wear colored glasses/to have a prejudiced viewpoint
to have a pair of prescription glasses made

sentences.english: The little rain drop slipt from the umbrella to my glasses.
sentences.chinese: 從她傘骨滑下來的小雨點濺在我眼鏡玻璃上。

sentences.english: Behind the thick lens of her glasses her blue-green eyes 3)clouded with concern.
sentences.chinese: 透過厚厚的眼鏡片，她那藍綠色的眼睛滿是擔憂。

sentences.english: I'm confused. Should I go to an optometrist or ophthalmologist for my eye exam?
sentences.chinese: 我應該看驗光師還是眼科醫師，作眼鏡查抄時？

sentences.english: Do you know a good optician ?
Marian teased George about his big glasses.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗安取笑喬治的大眼鏡。

sentences.english: They may look like an ordinary pair of spectacles, but these glasses are at the forefront of a revolution in eyewear.
sentences.chinese: 它們看起來像普通的眼鏡，但是是眼鏡改革的最前沿。

sentences.english: They may look like an ordinary pair of spectacles, but these glasses are at the forefront of a revolution in eyewear.
sentences.chinese: 它們看起來像普通的眼鏡，但是是眼鏡改革的最前沿。

sentences.english: I read newspaper, is wearing a Presbyopia mirror.
sentences.chinese: 我看書報時，是戴了老花眼鏡。

sentences.english: Surprised, the old man put on his spectacles and stared at him.
sentences.chinese: 那老人驚訝地戴上眼鏡，望着他。

sentences.english: He cried, his blue eyes blazing angrily behind his spectacles.
sentences.chinese: 他咆哮着，眼鏡後的藍眼睛閃爍着熊熊怒火。

sentences.english: Safety glasses should be worn when setting off fireworks and sparklers.
sentences.chinese: 應戴安全眼鏡時燃放煙花爆竹和煙花。

sentences.english: You get up in the morning and put on your glasses, snap on the radio, and grab the morning paper.
sentences.chinese: 你在早上醒來，戴上眼鏡，打開收音機，拿起早報。
我超愛龜甲色的眼鏡框。

sentences.english: This is a pair of spectacles for nearsighted persons.
There' a bespectacled seniors gentleman sitting on the chair.
sentences.chinese: 椅子上坐着一位戴眼鏡的老紳士。

definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to go out/to leave home/to go on a journey/away from home/(of a woman) to get married
